info.title: Graph REST Service API
info.description: Graph Service ASP.NET Core Web API

get.summary:
GET api/analyze
Retrieves the list of all the available analyzers

post.summary: POST api/analyze/{stage|store}/{tool}/{operation}

parameters.name: destination
parameters.description: STAGE/STORE: which kind of persistence was used to save the chart (if dcj field is filled -> STORE)

parameters.name: tool
parameters.description: The analyzer's code (available at GET api/analyze)

parameters.name: operation
parameters.description:
The algorithm chosen
Available algorithms for the SNA analyzer: "PageRank", "Betweeness", "ConnectedComponents", "WeaklyConnectedComponents", "HITS", "EffectiveCloseness", "SingleSourceShortestPath", "StronglyConnectedComponents", "LabelPropagation", "SpeakerListenerLabelPropagation"
Available algorithms for the GRAPH analyzer: "KPaths"

200.description: Returns the results of the analysis

get.description:
ONLY AVAILABLE FOR SNA analyzer Perform analysis on stage or store with specific tool and action
TASKID: The task id returned by the POST api/analyze request
USER: The username of the user who launched the algorithm

parameters.name: taskId
parameters.description: The task id returned by the POST api/analyze request

200.description: Returns the status of the task

post.summary:
POST api/datapermission/visibility
Returns the filtered data cart based on the visibility of the elements
post.description:
dcj: a file .json compressed in a zip file
dcjserialized: a string alternative to zip file, use only for small datacart

post.summary:
POST api/datapermission/moveability
Returns the filtered data cart based on the moveability of the elements
post.description:
dcj: a file .json compressed in a zip file
dcjserialized: a string alternative to zip file, use only for small datacart

post.summary:
POST api/datapermission/deletability
Returns the deletability of element of the visible element od data cart adding the custom property "deletable"
post.description:
dcj: a file .json compressed in a zip file
dcjserialized: a string alternative to zip file, use only for small datacart

post.summary:
POST api/datapermission/updability
Returns the updability of element of the data cart adding the custom property "updatable"
post.description:
dcj: a file .json compressed in a zip file
dcjserialized: a string alternative to zip file, use only for small datacart

post.summary:
POST api/datapermission
Returns the updability and deletability of visible element of the data cart adding the custom property "updatable" and "deletable"
post.description:
dcj: a file .json compressed in a zip file
dcjserialized: a string alternative to zip file, use only for small datacart

get.summary:
GET api/datamodel/dmj
Retrieve the datamodel as dmj

GET api/graphs/
Retrieve the list of chart for specific user

parameters.name: destination
parameters.description: STAGE/STORE: which kind of persistence was used to save the charts

post.summary:
POST api/graphs/
Upload datcart (zip/dcj string) with metadata to store or stage
post.description:
The entities/links in the datacart will be saved in the db, if the entity/link is already in the db, its MERGEMODE will be used to proceed - MERGEMODE.MERGE -> update the item with the properties unified (ex.: if a property in common is text it will be concatenated) - MERGEMODE.SKIP -> do not update the object in the db - else -> substitute the object in the db with the new one If the id is specified, the chart will be updated, otherwise a new chart will be created
DESTINATION: STAGE/STORE: which kind of persistence to use to save the chart
NAME: the name to associate the chart with (use for a new chart). If null, the items are saved without a chart reference or the id is used
ID: the id the chart is associated to (use for edit purposes, it is more important than 'name')
DCJ: a file named dcj.json compressed in a zip file
dcjserialized: a string alternative to zip file, use only for small datacart
centralElement: a string containing the dcj of the central entity

201.description: All the items have been added/edited

get.summary:
GET api/graphs/properties
Retrieve the list of properties in the DB for all the nodes

GET api/graphs/{chartid}
Retrieve chart content with chartid

parameters.name: chartId
parameters.description: The id of the chart to retrieve

delete.summary:
DELETE api/graphs/deleteChart/{chartId}
Delete chart using chartId
delete.description: Only the chart object and its chartitems will be deleted, the entities/links in the chart will remain in the db

parameters.name: chartId
parameters.description: The id of the chart to delete

post.summary:
POST api/graphs/delete
Delete items from the db or delete their reference from charts
post.description:
If id is specified, remove the chartitems that link the chart with the entities/links in the datacart Else delete the items inside the datacart from the db
id: the id of the chart to unlink the entities/links from
groupId: the id of the group to unlink the entities/links from
dcj: a file named dcj.json compressed in a zip file
dcjserialized: a string alternative to zip file, use only for small datacart

200.description: All the items have been deleted

206.description: Some of the items could not be deleted, the response contains a dcj with that items and, inside each one a custom property ERROR_MESSAGE with the cause

post.summary:
POST api/graphs/search
Perform search using the datacart in the requestParameters
post.description:
For each entity in the datacart, the search will return all the entities in the db that have the same properties (except for the key) as it has
For text fields, it performs a LIKE query using these wildcards
    `_`: A single arbitrary character
    `%`: Zero, one or many arbitrary characters
    `\\_`: A literal underscore
    `\\%`: A literal percent sign
For other fields' types it performs an exact match
For fields that have a RANGE SearchInputType it uses the properties
    - {propertyName}__START: the start of the range
    - {propertyName}__END: the end of the range

parameters.name: body
parameters.description: Parameters to use for the search operation

200.description: Returns the dcj of the result datacart it.sealink.xmlmodel.datacart.DcxDataCart

post.summary:
POST api/graphs/list
Retrieve the list of chart for specific user and value

POST api/graphs/list-linked
Retrieve the list of types' entities that are linked with entities for specific user and value
post.description:
To retrieve all the entities of type 'Nota' that contain an entity with a specific value
   search for that value in the 'Query' field and set the 'Types' field to the list of types you want to retrieve ex: ['Nota']

parameters.name: body
parameters.description: the parameters for the search

post.summary:
POST api/graphs/list-nodes
Retrieve the list of nodes for specific value
post.description:
It performs a LIKE query on all the properties' values using these wildcards
    `_`: A single arbitrary character
    `%`: Zero, one or many arbitrary characters
    `\\_`: A literal underscore
    `\\%`: A literal percent sign

200.description: Returns the dcj of the result datacart it.sealink.xmlmodel.datacart.DcxDataCart

post.summary:
POST api/graphs/expand
Retrieve the list of nodes linked to nodes with specific key and the respective links

parameters.name: body
parameters.description: The request object

200.description: Returns the dcj of the result datacart it.sealink.xmlmodel.datacart.DcxDataCart

post.summary:
POST api/graphs/neighbors-frequency
Retrieve the neighbors of the nodes in the datacart and the frequency of their links

parameters.name: body
parameters.description: The request object

200.description: Returns the dcj of the result datacart it.sealink.xmlmodel.datacart.DcxDataCart

post.summary:
POST api/graphs/expandCluster
Expand cluster by ids

parameters.name: body
parameters.description: Params to use for the expansion

post.summary:
POST api/graphs/graph-to-query
Retrieves all the subgraphs in the db that have the same pattern as the input graph
post.description:
The datacart in the result is the union of all the datacarts of the subgraphs
Each item in the datacart has a custom property 'GRS_IN_PATHS' that contains an array of strings which identify the paths where that item is present

200.description: Returns the dcj of the result datacart it.sealink.xmlmodel.datacart.DcxDataCart

post.summary:
POST api/graphs/similar
Get graph with entities that are similar to the ones provided in the input graph

parameters.name: body
parameters.description: Params to use for the expansion

200.description: Returns the dcj of the result datacart it.sealink.xmlmodel.datacart.DcxDataCart

post.summary:
POST api/graphs/searchByParams
Perform search using the requestParameters

parameters.name: body
parameters.description: Parameters to use for the search operation

200.description: Returns the dcj of the result datacart it.sealink.xmlmodel.datacart.DcxDataCart

post.summary:
POST api/matches
Upload zip with metadata to store
post.description: DCJ: a file named dcj.json containing all the links (matches) compressed in a zip file

post.summary:
POST api/matches/delete
Upload zip with metadata to store
post.description: DCJ: a file named dcj.json containing all the links (matches) compressed in a zip file

post.summary:
GET api/matches/ids
Retrieve all the matches in the db or filter the matches by specific nodes ids

parameters.name: body
parameters.description: Object containing user and nodes ids to filter

200.description: Returns the dcj of the result datacart it.sealink.xmlmodel.datacart.DcxDataCart

post.summary:
POST api/matches/expand
Returns all the matches related to the entities in the input datacart

parameters.name: body
parameters.description: Parameters to use for the search operation

200.description: Returns the dcj of the result datacart it.sealink.xmlmodel.datacart.DcxDataCart

post.summary:
POST api/matches/dismatches
Upload zip with metadata to store
post.description: DCJ: a file named dcj.json containing all the links (dismatches) compressed in a zip file

post.summary:
GET api/matches/dismatches/ids
Retrieve all the dismatches in the db or filter the dismatches by specific nodes ids

parameters.name: body
parameters.description: Object containing user and nodes ids to filter

200.description: Returns the dcj of the result datacart it.sealink.xmlmodel.datacart.DcxDataCart

inser entit and links in datacart

dcj.description: Result of the analyzer for node analysis (If the analyzer provides a result)

paths.description: Result of the analyzer for paths analysis (If the analyzer provides a result)

ExpansionParameters.description: Parametri per le operazioni di espansione

minDepth.description: Numero minimo di passi per l'espansione (default 0)

maxDepth.description: Numero massimo di passi per l'espansione (default 1)

types.description: Tipi di entit da filtrare nella risposta (default lista vuota - considera tutti)

includeInputEntities.description: Include le entit di input nella risposta (default true)

includeMatches.description: Include i match tra i nodi e li trasforma in gruppi e mantiene i link (default false)

includeOnlyConfirmedMatches.description: Include solo i con propriet confirmed = true (considerato solo se IncludeMatches = true, default false)

SearchParameters.description: Parametri per le operazioni di search

query.description:
Query di ricerca (usata nelle query full text)
Wildcard supportate:
    `_`: Un carattere singolo
    `%`: Zero, uno o pi caratteri
    `\\_`: Un underscore
    `\\%`: Un segno di percentuale

types.description: Tipi entit da ricercare (usato nelle query full text, default lista vuota)

includeInputEntities.description: Include le entit di input nella risposta (default true)

limit.description: Numero di entit da restituire per ciascuna entit di input (default 0 = tutte) - usato per la paginazione

skip.description: Numero di entit da ignorare (default 0) - usato per la paginazione

includeCharts.description: Include i chartId nei nodi - usato nella SearchByParams

includeMatches.description: Include i match tra i nodi e li trasforma in gruppi - usato nella SearchByParams

chartIds.description: Chart nei quali ricercare - usato nella SearchByParams

includeNeighbours.description: Include i vicini dei nodi (ed i relativi link)

clusterizationCriteria.description: Criterio per la clusterizzazione ('Chart' per clusterizzare in base ai chart di appartenenza, nome della propriet per clusterizzare in base ai valori di essa)

clusterizationCriteriaValue.description:
Usato per espandere i cluster delle propriet (es. 
       "ClusterizationCriteria": "City",
       "ClusterizationCriteriaValue": "Barcelona")

getAll.description: Include tutti i nodi e estrae gli elementi appartenenti ai gruppi

params.description: Parametri extra per la ricerca, tra cui quelli degli analyzer (DA SISTEMARE)

dcj.description: DataCart serializzato con il metodo ToDCJ()
